name: Moto X Bike
description:
This game is a fully physics based fun Motocross style stunt game. Perform Stunts and Gain Coins. Update your license and upgrade your skills to unlock new cool bikes.
Complete Fun Game. Fill the Repo Meter to multiply your coins unto 4X. Unlock stages and Bikes. Motocross Extreme Only Bikes will Climb Hill and Conquer the cliff by their stunts. No limit to license Upgrade. 2 Special Buttons to control bike stunts.
